00033 /*
00034  * Responsible for rendering and updating all the world objects.
00035  * Have pondered the need for an update callback that is handed 
00036  * out by the frame (and updates would be checked for every frameStarted()).
00037  * But for now, we'll assume WorldObjects will know how to morph themselves
00038  * over time (in update())
00039  */

00041 {
00042   public:
00043     OgreRenderer();
00044     virtual ~OgreRenderer();

00046     virtual SceneManager* getSceneManager();
00047     virtual PhysicsEngine* getPhysicsEngine();
00048     virtual OISFrame* getFrame();
00049     virtual bool run();
00055     double getPhysicsTime();

00057     void setupResources();
